entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
